Language: English
Tablet: there

System requirements :
OS : Windows XP SP3, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1

Memory: 2 GB RAM

Space : 1150 MB
Extras. Information: You may have problems with ATI graphics cards under Windows Vista

Description:
Lords of the Black Sun - epic , complex, exciting 4X- global turn-based strategy , action which takes place in deep space.

Stand at the head of one of the races and join the fight for galactic domination. As the head of the empire, you have to explore the stars , to colonize new worlds , to rule an empire and conquer all who dare to oppose you .
The galaxy is full of mysteries and dangers : Wanted ancient ruins and artifacts , fight or be friends with pirates , educate the general who will lead your fleet to victory. Whipping a complex web of conspiracies with allies or send spies to look for vulnerabilities empires , the heads of which have vowed to destroy you .
Always keep your subjects happy. Otherwise, be prepared for the anti-government demonstrations , and in the worst case scenario , to the appearance of your empire rebels.

Only the most powerful rulers can hold on to power in the depths of space . And you are able to become the ruler of the Star ?
